message.body: I hve no idea what time i'm getting bck today but if I finish up everything kind of late i'll try to load everything in the kiln at least. Is that alright?
i'll probably be loading after academic bowl practice tonight, so you definitely have lots of time!
Okay awesome! :DD Apparently we'll be back around 4 or 5 at the latest but there aren't any guarantees
no problem, i'm sure it'll work out!
Stupid question but can we lean things against bricks/the side of the kiln as long as glaze isn't touching? I have something that is going to lean agains
t something else so I want to glaze the side it's leaning on :/
bricks, yeah, but not the side of the kiln. no glaze can touch, like you said.
Okay awesome thanks!! If I leave the studio before you come i'll prop it up on bricks the way I want it in the kiln if that makes it easier
